text: Justin Raimondo (born Dennis Raimondo;Birthname mention November 18, 1951http://www.joincalifornia.com/candidate/2787 - June 27, 2019) was an American writer and the editorial director of the website Antiwar.com. He was born in White Plains, New York. Raimondo died on June 27, 2019 in Sebastopol, California from lung cancer at the age of 67. == References == ==Other websites== * Raimondo's Online Work at AntiWar.com * Raimondo's Online Work at TakiMag.com Category:Politicians from California Category:Politicians from New York (state) Category:Writers from New York (state) Category:Writers from San Francisco Category:Anarcho-capitalists Category:LGBT people from New York (state) Category:LGBT people from California Category:Gay men Category:American LGBT writers Category:American LGBT politicians Category:1951 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American bloggers Category:People from White Plains, New York
title: Justin Raimondo
